Package se.jguru.nazgul.tools.codestyle.enforcer.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEnforcerRule
    Abstract Enforcer rule specification, handling some pretty printing of exceptions.
    AbstractNonCacheableEnforcerRule
    AbstractEnforcerRule implementation which implements a non-cacheable behaviour.
    CorrectPackagingRule
    Enforcer rule to enforce correct packaging for all source files within a project, implying that all source files should be located within or under a package identical to the groupId of the project itself.
    RestrictImplDependencies
    Enforcer rule to restrict importing Impl projects with the exception of actual JEE deployment projects.
    ValidateProjectType
    Enforcer rule to validate ProjectType compliance, to harmonize the pom structure in terms of groupId, artifactId, packaging and (rudimentary) content checks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProjectType
    Definition of project types, including pattern matching for recognition.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RuleFailureException
    Exception indicating that an enforcer rule implementation has encountered a failure state.
